H0.text: How many dot positions are usually used in each letter of the Braille system. 3

H1.text: How many dot positions are usually used in each letter of the Braille system. 4

H3.text: How many dot positions are usually used in each letter of the Braille system. 6

A4.text: A full braille cell includes six raised dots arranged in two columns, each column having three dots.

A5.text: There are 64 possible combinations, including no dots at all for a word space.
